about_the_game:
From the everyday passenger to the horrors of Halloween, Spirit Driver is a short, casual conversation visual novel where your choices can affect the fates of people and spirits alike.

As an old taxi driver nearing retirement, you'll be spending your time working the "special shift" during the week of Halloween. During this special shift, your passengers will consist of both people and supernatural beings.

Originally made for the 2024 Spooktober 6th Annual Visual Novel Jam, Spirit Driver is releasing on Steam with a few changes from the original, including achievements, cafe changes, and minor tweaks. The main story remains the same. This version is mainly for those who wish to support us and/or get achievements on Steam.

Features:

  • 8+ Characters to interact with

  • Approximately 1 hour of gameplay (Highly dependent on choices made and reading speed)

  • Different endings for each situation depending on your choices

  • In house menu and pre-shift music

  • Various CC0-CC4.0 Assets, Music, and SFX

  • Random assortment of references to other media

  • Added various achievements to get throughout the game
